tmpl:
+
{{#eq ${dataList}.0.type 'video' }}
{{/eq}}
    {{#${dataList}}} {{#eq type "video"}}
  • {{{lazyImage thumbnailUrl "title='{{title}}' alt='{{title}}' data-url='{{thumbnailUrl}}' data-video='{{url}}'" "true"}}}
    • {{/eq}} {{#eq type "360"}}
  • {{{lazyImage imgUrlList.[0] "title='{{title}}' alt='{{title}}' data-url='{{imgUrlList.[0]}}'" "true"}}}
    • {{/eq}} {{#eq type "image"}}
  • {{{lazyImage url "title='{{title}}' alt='{{title}}' data-url='{{url}}' " "true"}}}
    • {{/eq}} {{/${dataList}}}
